title: How Ought We Live? with Jay Shapiro
description:
Jay and I chat about the recent abortion bill in Alabama, how we need to start philosophizing more as a society, and the potential rise of AI to godhood status

Follow me here:
twitter: @theother_95
Instagram: @theother95
Facebook: @theother95page
Email me: theotherninetyfive@gmail.com
